titleStmt.title: The clergyman's office, and the clergyman's due a sermon preach'd at the Triennial Visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God Edward, Lord Bishop of Gloucester at Campden, Octob. 7, 1698 / by Robert Morse ...
titleStmt.author: Morse, Robert, 1660 or 61-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Bennet ... and Henry Clements ...,
